    Methods in games.stendhal.server.core.events with parameters of type TurnListener
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    TurnNotifier.dontNotify​(TurnListener turnListener)
    Forgets all registered notification entries for the given TurnListener where the entry's message equals the given one.
    int
    TurnNotifier.getRemainingSeconds​(TurnListener turnListener)
    Finds out how many seconds will pass until the given TurnListener will be notified with the given message.
    int
    TurnNotifier.getRemainingTurns​(TurnListener turnListener)
    Finds out how many turns will pass until the given TurnListener will be notified with the given message.
    void
    TurnNotifier.notifyAtTurn​(int turn, TurnListener turnListener)
    Notifies the turnListener at turn number turn.
    void
    TurnNotifier.notifyInSeconds​(int sec, TurnListener turnListener)
    Notifies the turnListener in sec seconds.
    void
    TurnNotifier.notifyInTurns​(int diff, TurnListener turnListener)
    Notifies the turnListener in diff turns.
